location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a petition from Ibrahim, a native of Persia, to Sir Evan Nepean, Governor and President of the Council at Bombay, requesting assistance in recovering his property, taken from the Ahmed Shah.
